name: Mahjong Connect: Food
description:
Mahjong Connect:  Food is a tile-matching puzzle game. 

Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board before the time runs out!

It's ideal if you want some solo gaming time or a mentally engaging challenge.

Game Features:

Simple, but attractive gameplay!

Nice pixel visuals

24 levels to beat

Levels with gravity support in all 4 directions

Shuffle and hint functions helpers
